LINE_LENGTH: 79

**********
Parameters
----------
arg1 : str
    First part is
    pre-wrapped but
    should not be
    respected.

    Second part is very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very long.

**********

Parameters
----------
arg1 : str
    First part is pre-wrapped but should not be respected.

    Second part is very very very very very very very very very very very very
    very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very
    very very very very very very very long.
